nodes.text: The scholar Hethan Romund was rescued from the Dark Side Adept Malefax by several Force-sensitive allies.

The scholar Hethan Romund spent years searching the galaxy for information about the fallen Jedi Order, and in the process met or trained a number of Force-sensitive individuals—Pon Edestus, Belandi Feearr, Dao Jodh, Kaveri Ra, Tarast Voon, and Sarenda. When she was captured by the Dark Side Adept Malefax, at the last moment she transferred a message to those individuals.
First, they had to scale a valley to reach the Dawn Temple on Mount Tellec.
They then encountered the Gatekeeper who questioned the individuals about their purpose their. They eventually moved on.
Afterward, they encountered a group of hunters who had been corrupted by the dark side of the Force.
They became captured in pits, but were able to escape using their Force powers.
The Force-sensitives then had to traverse a bridge to the temple which was guarded by Advozse mercenaries.

On their way to the temple, they were ambushed by a pack of icewolves, also corrupted by the dark side. After defeating the pack, they were able to enter the temple, where Malefax was interrogating Romund. They engaged the Adept, eventually defeating him and driving off the mercenaries.
The Gatekeeper then asked the Force-sensitives for their help in clearing the Temple of the dark side corruption.

The rescue forms the basis for the Mountaintop Rescue adventure in Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Force and Destiny Beginner Game. The adventure consists of seven pre-made encounters for a roleplaying game.
